name: Itchio-Github-Unity-CI
description:
Open Source project created with the goal to normalize Continuous Integration and Delivery in the development community. 

 [You won't believe how many companies still fear this topic and lose money and employes because they still do all of it manually!]

https://github.com/L4ZZA/itchio-unity-ci

A bit thanks to Game CI for being part of this movement .
